title: How Many Calories in Boba?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in boba (bubble tea), including a standard serving's full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for different preparations.
assumptions: Medium (16 oz) black milk tea boba with tapioca pearls, whole milk, and moderate sugar syrup; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by shop, size, milk type, sweetness level, and add-ins like fruits or cheese foam. Check specific labels or apps for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A medium serving of boba tea typically contains about 350 calories, mostly from sugar and tapioca pearls.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small boba?
faqs.a: A small (12 oz) boba tea has about 250-300 calories, depending on customizations.

faqs.q: Are boba pearls high in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, about 100 calories per 1/4 cup of cooked tapioca pearls, mainly from carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in sugar-free boba?
faqs.a: Around 200-250 calories for a medium serving, reduced by skipping sugar syrup.

faqs.q: What's the protein in boba tea?
faqs.a: Typically 4-6 g per serving, mostly from milk; plant-based milks may vary.

faqs.q: Do fruit boba teas have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Sometimes, around 250-350 calories if low-sugar, but added fruits can increase natural sugars.
